com.gopivotal.mapreduce.lib.driver

Class AbstractMapReduceDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
      • com.gopivotal.mapreduce.lib.driver.AbstractMapReduceDriver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool

    @InterfaceStability.Unstable
public abstract class AbstractMapReduceDriver
extends org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
implements org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool
    This class is intended to be extended by basic analytics to provide a number of basic command line arguments. It is a work in progress.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public int run(String[] args)
        throws Exception
        Parses the command line options, gathering the CSV input paths, output directory, and any specified number of mappers and reducers. It then builds the job object, calls preJobLaunch, runs the job, then postJobCompletion.
        Specified by:
        run in interface org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool
        Throws:
        Exception
